-- Update dandlynn@yahoo.com to be a paid Personal Plan subscriber
INSERT INTO subscribers (user_id, stripe_customer_id, stripe_subscription_id, plan_name, status, current_period_end, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
    ''dandlynn@yahoo.com'',
    ''cus_test_dandlynn'',
    ''sub_test_dandlynn'', 
    ''Personal Plan'',
    ''active'',
    ''2025-12-31 23:59:59'',
    NOW(),
    NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (user_id) 
DO UPDATE SET 
    stripe_customer_id = ''cus_test_dandlynn'',
    stripe_subscription_id = ''sub_test_dandlynn'',
    plan_name = ''Personal Plan'',
    status = ''active'',
    current_period_end = ''2025-12-31 23:59:59'',
    updated_at = NOW();

-- Verify the update
SELECT user_id, plan_name, status, current_period_end FROM subscribers WHERE user_id = ''dandlynn@yahoo.com'';
")
